columns.name: name
columns.description: The name associated with the finding, usually a CVE number.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is generated.

columns.name: uri
columns.description: A link containing additional details about the security vulnerability.

columns.name: image_scan_status
columns.description: The current state of the scan

columns.name: image_scan_status_description
columns.description: The description of the image scan status.

columns.name: image_scan_completed_at
columns.description: The date and time, in JavaScript date format, when the repository was created.

columns.name: vulnerability_source_updated_at
columns.description: The date and time, in JavaScript date format, when the repository was created.
